subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: When Dale Earnhardt Jr. joins Hendrick Motorsports in 2008, he will be taking an unparalleled fan base and giant merchandise machine with him.
snippet: When Dale Earnhardt Jr. joins Hendrick Motorsports in 2008, he will be taking an unparalleled fan base and giant merchandise machine with him.
